about_the_game:
Who knew that Cozy Town had such a great nightlife?
It appears that some strays only venture out at night!
All proceeds that Devcats and Travellin Cats will receive from this DLC will go to A SELECTED CAT SHELTER, so you’ll be having fun while making a real difference in the lives of stray cats. This won't be a one time donation, we will aid the selected institution for as long as the game profits.
Explore the nighttime streets and alleys of Cozy Town to find and help the nocturnal strays.

  • Another 150 Strays + more items to find!
  • All proceeds from this DLC will go to cat shelters
  • Join us in "Stray Cats In Cozy Town: Night Lights" and be a part of something special.
  • Have fun finding all the stray cats from Cozy Town while supporting real-life strays too.
detailed_description:
Who knew that Cozy Town had such a great nightlife?
It appears that some strays only venture out at night!
All proceeds that Devcats and Travellin Cats will receive from this DLC will go to A SELECTED CAT SHELTER, so you’ll be having fun while making a real difference in the lives of stray cats. This won't be a one time donation, we will aid the selected institution for as long as the game profits.
Explore the nighttime streets and alleys of Cozy Town to find and help the nocturnal strays.

  • Another 150 Strays + more items to find!
  • All proceeds from this DLC will go to cat shelters
  • Join us in "Stray Cats In Cozy Town: Night Lights" and be a part of something special.
  • Have fun finding all the stray cats from Cozy Town while supporting real-life strays too.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any OS with x11 support
  • Processor: 1.3GHz or more, 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or superior
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

Recommended:
